FuncDef:
The delay-measurement source start pm command starts delay measurement on a source interface.
By default, the delay measurement duration is 500 ms.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies how long the delay measurement lasts.
The value is an integer ranging from 50 to 1000, in ms. The default value is 500.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To measure an OTN delay, run the delay-measurement source start pm command to start delay measurement on a source interface residing on the OTN network.
Precautions
The delay-measurement source start pm and loopback { local | remote } commands are mutually exclusive.The delay-measurement source start pm and set inner-connection interface commands are mutually exclusive.The delay-measurement source start pm and delay-measurement sink pm enable commands are mutually exclusive.
